languages.text: "Да. Шесть ментальных доминант. Деменц — Паранойя. После разделения он почувствовал, что его память соткана из лжи, и это ощущение свело его в недра безумия. Тарзус — Вера, пылающая и не сдающаяся. Аксиоманта — Логика, не замутненная эмоциями и суждениями о правильности".

"Yes. Six mental keynotes. Dementz was Paranoia. After the separation, he sensed that his memory was a web of lies, and that feeling drove him to the depths of madness. Tarzus was Faith, fiery and unyielding. Axiomantha was Logic, unclouded by emotion or value judgements."
languages.original_text: "Да. Шесть ментальных доминант. Деменц — Паранойя. После разделения он почувствовал, что его память соткана из лжи, и это ощущение свело его в недра безумия. Тарзус — Вера, пылающая и не сдающаяся. Аксиоманта — Логика, не замутненная эмоциями и суждениями о правильности".

traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「そのとおりだ。六つの精神基調。デメンツは妄執。分離後、自身の記憶が嘘で編まれたものだと感じとったために、狂気の深みへ落ちていった。ターザスは信仰。苛烈にして不屈。アクシオマンサは論理。感情や価値判断に惑わぬ精神」
languages.original_text: "Yes. Six mental keynotes. Dementz was Paranoia. After the separation, he sensed that his memory was a web of lies, and that feeling drove him to the depths of madness. Tarzus was Faith, fiery and unyielding. Axiomantha was Logic, unclouded by emotion or value judgements."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりだ。六つの精神基調。デメンツは妄執。分離後、自身の記憶が嘘で編まれたものだと感じとったために、狂気の深みへ落ちていった。ターザスは信仰。苛烈にして不屈。アクシオマンサは論理。感情や価値判断に惑わぬ精神」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “没错，他们分别代表着六种心理状态。德曼兹代表‘偏执’，从聚合意识分离之后，他意识到自己的记忆是一张谎言之网，这最终将他推进了疯狂的深渊。塔祖斯代表‘信仰’，热情而不屈。阿修曼塔代表‘逻辑’，不受情感或价值判断的影响。”
languages.original_text: "Yes. Six mental keynotes. Dementz was Paranoia. After the separation, he sensed that his memory was a web of lies, and that feeling drove him to the depths of madness. Tarzus was Faith, fiery and unyielding. Axiomantha was Logic, unclouded by emotion or value judgements."

traits.locale_text: “没错，他们分别代表着六种心理状态。德曼兹代表‘偏执’，从聚合意识分离之后，他意识到自己的记忆是一张谎言之网，这最终将他推进了疯狂的深渊。塔祖斯代表‘信仰’，热情而不屈。阿修曼塔代表‘逻辑’，不受情感或价值判断的影响。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Oui. Six caractéristiques mentales. Dementz était la paranoïa. Après la séparation, il s'est mis à croire que son souvenir n'était qu'un tissu de mensonges, ce qui l'a conduit à la folie. Tarzus était la foi, aussi ardente qu'inébranlable. Axiomantha la logique pure, exempte d'émotions ou de jugements de valeur. »
languages.original_text: "Yes. Six mental keynotes. Dementz was Paranoia. After the separation, he sensed that his memory was a web of lies, and that feeling drove him to the depths of madness. Tarzus was Faith, fiery and unyielding. Axiomantha was Logic, unclouded by emotion or value judgements."

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Six caractéristiques mentales. Dementz était la paranoïa. Après la séparation, il s'est mis à croire que son souvenir n'était qu'un tissu de mensonges, ce qui l'a conduit à la folie. Tarzus était la foi, aussi ardente qu'inébranlable. Axiomantha la logique pure, exempte d'émotions ou de jugements de valeur. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Así es. Seis cualidades mentales. Dementz era la Paranoia. Tras la separación, sintió que su memoria era una red de mentiras, y esa sensación lo desquició por completo. Tarzus era la Fe, ardiente e inquebrantable. Axiomantha era la Lógica. No le afectaban las emociones ni los juicios de valor».
languages.original_text: "Yes. Six mental keynotes. Dementz was Paranoia. After the separation, he sensed that his memory was a web of lies, and that feeling drove him to the depths of madness. Tarzus was Faith, fiery and unyielding. Axiomantha was Logic, unclouded by emotion or value judgements."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Seis cualidades mentales. Dementz era la Paranoia. Tras la separación, sintió que su memoria era una red de mentiras, y esa sensación lo desquició por completo. Tarzus era la Fe, ardiente e inquebrantable. Axiomantha era la Lógica. No le afectaban las emociones ni los juicios de valor».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Ja. Sechs mentale Leitmotive. Dementz war Paranoia. Nach der Trennung spürte er, dass sein Gedächtnis ein Netz aus Lügen war, und dieses Gefühl trieb ihn in die Tiefen des Wahnsinns. Tarzus war Glaube, flammend und unnachgiebig. Axiomantha war Logik, ungetrübt von Emotionen oder Werturteilen."
languages.original_text: "Yes. Six mental keynotes. Dementz was Paranoia. After the separation, he sensed that his memory was a web of lies, and that feeling drove him to the depths of madness. Tarzus was Faith, fiery and unyielding. Axiomantha was Logic, unclouded by emotion or value judgements."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Sechs mentale Leitmotive. Dementz war Paranoia. Nach der Trennung spürte er, dass sein Gedächtnis ein Netz aus Lügen war, und dieses Gefühl trieb ihn in die Tiefen des Wahnsinns. Tarzus war Glaube, flammend und unnachgiebig. Axiomantha war Logik, ungetrübt von Emotionen oder Werturteilen."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Evet. Altı zihinsel dayanak. Dementz, Paranoya'ydı. Ayrılma sonrasında hafızasının bir yalan ağı olduğunu sezdi, bu hissiyat onu deliliğin dibine vurdurdu. Tarzus, İnanç'tı. Azılı ve sarsılmazdı. Axiomantha, Mantık'tı. Duygulardan ve değer yargılarından azadeydi."
languages.original_text: "Yes. Six mental keynotes. Dementz was Paranoia. After the separation, he sensed that his memory was a web of lies, and that feeling drove him to the depths of madness. Tarzus was Faith, fiery and unyielding. Axiomantha was Logic, unclouded by emotion or value judgements."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Altı zihinsel dayanak. Dementz, Paranoya'ydı. Ayrılma sonrasında hafızasının bir yalan ağı olduğunu sezdi ve bu hissiyat onu deliliğin derinliklerine taşıdı. Tarzus, İnanç'tı. Azılı ve sarsılmazdı. Axiomantha, Mantık'tı. Duygulardan ve değer yargılarından azattı."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
